name: The Breach (Nitheesh Pillai)
description:
While going through an old stash of things in the basement, you come across a strange looking device (very original).

Out of curiosity, you examine the device and find a switch on it. As soon as you press the switch, a blinding white light starts radiating from the screen of the device and you get teleported to a digital dimension.

As you step into the dimension, the system detects a foreign presence and activates its security mechanism. You have to breach the security system and escape this dimension in order to survive. Can you make it?

NOTE: This game is in a very early stage of development. Any feedback would be really helpful in making it better. Thank you! This game will be converted to a browser friendly version soon.
